decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Samples of materials to match the replacement garage hereby permitted shall, wherever possible, re-use existing materials or similar second-hand materials or, if necessary, new materials to match the original brickwork.  Samples of the brick, paint and external finishes to be used shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before the development is concerned.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved samples.  REASON:  To ensure the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The development permitted shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential use or for any industrial, commercial or business use.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupiers of neighbouring properties.
description: Demolition of semi-detached garage and erection of replacement garage in rear garden
